results.name: Array of coefficients in Zagier's polynomials P_(n,0)(x).
comment: Zagier's polynomial P_{n,m} (m<=n and m>=0) are used under pari-gp (for algorithmic acceleration of alternating or positive series)
Up to signs, coefficients of Chebyshev's T-polynomials for even index. See A127674.
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Oct 18 2002
